error.description: The error details if the request was not successful.

response_status.title: Response Status
response_status.description: HTTP status code returned by destination

callback_id.title: Callback Id
callback_id.description: Identifier of the callback attempt flow

description.title: Description
examples: This CallbackMapping is used for adapter callback

external_path.title: External Path
external_path.description: Full external path exposed to clients

internal_path.title: Internal Path
internal_path.description: Full internal URL path to route the request to

adapter_nats_subject.title: Adapter Nats Subject
adapter_nats_subject.description: NATS subject for the adapter to publish messages to

retry_policy.description: Retry behavior configuration for delivery attempts

security_policy.description: Security policy including IP filtering and rate limiting

terminal.description: Terminal to which the callback is associated

terminal.description: Terminal to which the callback is associated

error_type.title: Error Type
error_type.description: A string identifier for the error type.

error_message.title: Error Message
error_message.description: A human-readable error message describing the issue.

status.description: Indicates the health status of the service.

items.title: Items
items.description: A list of items in the current page.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: The maximum number of items returned in a single page.

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: The starting index for the current page.

total.title: Total
total.description: The total number of available items.

items.title: Items
items.description: A list of items in the current page.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: The maximum number of items returned in a single page.

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: The starting index for the current page.

total.title: Total
total.description: The total number of available items.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: The quantity part of the rate value. It represents the numeric value without the decimal separator. For example, '12.34' is stored as 1234.

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.description: The accuracy factor for the rate value. It must be a power of 10 (e.g., 1, 10, 100, 1000) corresponding to the number of decimal places.

retry_on_status.title: Retry On Status
retry_on_status.description: List of HTTP status codes that should trigger a retry. Empty list disables retry based on status code.

allowed_ips.title: Allowed Ips
allowed_ips.description: List of allowed IPs or networks (CIDR) that can access the route

blocked_ips.title: Blocked Ips
blocked_ips.description: IPs or networks to explicitly deny (takes precedence over allowed)

rate_limit.title: Rate Limit
rate_limit.description: Maximum number of requests per minute per source IP

burst_limit.title: Burst Limit
burst_limit.description: Number of requests allowed to exceed the rate limit in bursts

blocked.title: Blocked
blocked.description: Entire route is blocked and should not process any callbacks

enforcement_mode.title: Enforcement Mode
enforcement_mode.description: Mode of policy enforcement: 'log' only logs violations, 'strict' blocks them

fees.title: Fees
fees.description: Mapping of fee configurations with fee.id as key

provider.title: Provider
provider.description: Provider name associated with the terminal

account_created.title: Account Created
account_created.description: Indicates if the account is created

callback_url.title: Callback Url
callback_url.description: Callback URL template or final callback URL. If the value contains '{api_key}', it will be replaced with auth['api_key'] during registration.
